mapper.insert: insert into student_check ( student_id, student_name, sourse_id, course_name_s_e_time, STATUS, remarks) values ( #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseNameSETime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update student_check set student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_name = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sourse_id = #{sourseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_name_s_e_time = #{courseNameSETime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select UUID, student_id, student_name, sourse_id, course_name_s_e_time, STATUS, remarks from student_check

select UUID, student_id, student_name, sourse_id, course_name_s_e_time, STATUS, remarks from student_check
course_name_s_e_time like concat('%',#{courseNameSETime},'%')
and status like concat('%',#{status},'%')

select count(1) from student_check
course_name_s_e_time like concat('%',#{courseNameSETime},'%')
and status like concat('%',#{status},'%')
